meanings.definition: Having color or a certain color.
meanings.sent1: The flowers in the garden were bright and coloreds.
meanings.sent2: She picked out a coloreds dress for the party.

meanings.definition: People of a non-white race, especially African Americans.
meanings.sent1: The museum showcased a collection of paintings by famous coloreds artists.
meanings.sent2: Coloreds have made significant contributions to the music industry.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, everyone wanted to dress up as a famous coloreds figure.
meanings.sent4: The history books tell the stories of struggles faced by coloreds in the past.
